[[File:Flag_camping.gif|thumb]]
__TOC__
==Description==
The [[Camping]] skill allows a player to logout safely when in the wild. It's not often used since players can logout in Inns or safely in towns. It's considered one of those "Useless" skills such as [[Begging]] and [[Herding]]

==Usage==
In order to create a camp, you require kindling to create a fire and a bedroll. Use the kindling and it will ignite, after the fire is lit, you will recieve a message stating that the camp is secure. You and anyone near you may then use the bedroll to log out.

==Recommended Leveling==
:0-50: Buy from NPC
:50-100: Create camps (Kindling can be purchased from a provisioner)
